channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Word
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Word

item.title: CVE-2018-0792|2024-08-05T03:35:49.326Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20word
item.description: Microsoft Word 2016 in Microsoft Office 2016 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Microsoft Word Remote Code Execution Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0794.

item.title: CVE-2018-0794|2024-08-05T03:35:49.427Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20word
item.description: Microsoft Word in Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Office 2013, and Microsoft Office 2016 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Microsoft Word Remote Code Execution Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0792.
